Welcome to Aldea Tax Services

What we offer

Just like other accounting firms we offer many services. We are constantally adding more services as clients request them. Please let us know and we will see what we can do for you and your business.

Who am I

Anthony Aldea

Hello, my name is Anthony and I am a former truck driver that has earned a Bachelors of Science in Interdiscplinary Studies. I studied computer engineering, sociology, and accounting. I have since earned an MBA, and I am studying for my CPA exam. I am bilingual, and I am working on learning several different languages now. I have also started a new masters degree: Masters of Divinity in Pastoral Counselling. I get to learn Greek and Hebrew ehre ontop of the German, French, and Esperanto I am working on.

Mission Statement

To provide accurate service in all that we do, even if it is something that the customer does not want to hear, because hurt feelings are easier to get through than an IRS audit.

Statement of Faith

As a Christian, I will work as if I am working for the Lord. I will work in such a way that my integrity cannot be questioned because I will do right in all that I do. The Lord is my ultimate boss, and if I remember that, I cannot fail my clients.
